data.title: Laurentian University
data.text:
Engage. Comment. Share.

The Ontario College of Teachers wants to hear from you.

The College is reviewing a renewal application for the accreditation of the pre-service teacher education programs offered in French at l’École d’éducation, at Laurentian University.

If you are a student in one of these French-language programs, a member of faculty, an associate teacher, an alumnus or an interested member of the community, the College welcomes your comments and kudos on the quality of the programs.

You can provide your input on the French-language programs in two ways by January 6, 2023:
